title: 关于Oculus Rift的信息
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2016-8-26 17:27 编辑 

We've put out fixes & a FAQ for the Oculus Rift features that came with the 0.15.6 update. Changelog included too! http://mojang.com/2016/08/fixes-faqs-and-a-changelog-for-156/ …
我们在0.15.6更新的时候就放出了Oculus Rift特性、修复的bug和一个FAQ。也包括了更新日志哦！
